SEARCH

Package UILayer

package UILayer
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    addCategory
    Represents the user interface for adding, updating, and deleting categories.
    addProduct
    This class represents the user interface for adding products.
    AdminUI
    The AdminUI class represents the user interface for the admin functionality.
    CategoryTreeFrame
    The CategoryTreeFrame class represents the user interface for displaying a category tree and related product information.
    CategorywiseProducts
    The CategorywiseProducts class represents the user interface for generating and displaying pie charts representing product acquisition across different categories.
    graphMenu
    The graphMenu class represents the graphical user interface for accessing reports.
    LoginUI
    The LoginUI class represents the user interface for user authentication.
    Managermenu
    The Manager menu class represents the user interface for the manager's menu.
    operatorGraph
    The operatorGraph class represents the user interface for displaying pie charts of orders done by operators (sales assistants).
    OrderGraphUI
    The OrderGraphUI class represents the user interface for displaying order graphs.
    productReport
    The productReport class represents a JFrame for displaying bar charts of product expiration dates.
    SalesAssistantUI
    SalesAssistantUI class represents the user interface for the sales assistant (operator) functionality.
    salesBydate
    The salesBydate class represents a user interface for displaying bar charts of sales based on date range.
    stockAlert
    The stockAlert class represents a user interface for displaying bar charts of stock alerts.
    updateCategory
    The updateCategory class represents a user interface for updating category information.
    updateProduct
    The updateProduct class represents a user interface for updating product information.
    updateStock
    The updateStock class represents a user interface for updating stock information.
